Name: More than words
About the game: More than words is a conversational game you can chat a Artificial Inteligence powered by GPT NEO natrual language processing tecnology, you can have a full conversation with Marian Anderson. There are no predefined answers. The conversations are executed offline because GPT NEO is included in the game. Therefore, your conversations are completely anonymous. If you are looking for a game where you can have a casual conversation or you are curious to try the new advances in artificial intelligence, then More than words is for you!
